item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Wednesday, February 26, 2025 at 5:15 PM UTC
item.description:
1. MichiganTypeScript: A WebAssembly runtime implemented in TypeScript types (70 points | 5 comments)
2. Show HN: A Database Written in Golang (75 points | 25 comments)
3. Show HN: Breakout with a roguelite/vampire survivor twist (91 points | 31 comments)
4. Launch HN: Maritime Fusion (YC W25) – Fusion Reactors for Ships (14 points | 13 comments)
5. Bifurcation: The secret giant islands formed when rivers split (30 points | 2 comments)
6. The FFT Strikes Back: An Efficient Alternative to Self-Attention (268 points | 101 comments)
7. Long division verified via Hoare logic (11 points | 2 comments)
8. The Miserable State of Modems and Mobile Network Operators (65 points | 13 comments)
9. Should We Decouple Technology from Everyday Life? (21 points | 3 comments)
10. Telescope – an open-source web-based log viewer for logs stored in ClickHouse (131 points | 51 comments)
11. I Went to SQL Injection Court (1065 points | 381 comments)
12. DeepGEMM: clean and efficient FP8 GEMM kernels with fine-grained scaling (365 points | 61 comments)
13. Material Theme has been pulled from VS Code's marketplace (396 points | 297 comments)
14. Ask HN: Who Are Your Favorite Photography and Generative Coding Artists? (29 points | 19 comments)
15. Hyperspace (785 points | 406 comments)

19. Ggwave: Tiny Data-over-Sound Library (249 points | 59 comments)
20. A New Proposal for How Mind Emerges from Matter (40 points | 35 comments)
21. The journalists training AI models for Meta and OpenAI (62 points | 25 comments)
22. Hard problems that reduce to document ranking (300 points | 41 comments)
23. A CLI to quickly launch VSCode/cursor devcontainers (31 points | 11 comments)
24. Why are QR Codes with capital letters smaller than QR codes with lower case? (285 points | 85 comments)
25. Iterated Log Coding (87 points | 28 comments)
26. State of emergency declared after blackout plunges most of Chile into darkness (131 points | 112 comments)
27. The Deep Research problem (266 points | 112 comments)
28. Bald eagles are thriving again after near extinction (264 points | 183 comments)
29. Automattic Hit with Class Action over WP Engine Dispute (74 points | 26 comments)
30. Modernist Cuisine: The Art and Science of Cooking (113 points | 95 comments)
